group.name: Mathexp example
group.sample: This example demonstrate how parser can be use to parse input text, like mathematical expressions.

group.name: Wiki example
group.sample: In this example the parser were used to build an online editor, which based on the very popular syntax of Wiki.

group.name: Syntax highlighting example
group.sample: The parser also be used to colorize some source code. (Need once 2-3min, for the parser table generation process)
